name: Baby Drill (aburrron, Ztira, Alberto Cabrera Borges, Quirell, DarkSaytan, Luiserchote)
name_original: Baby Drill (aburrron, Ztira, Alberto Cabrera Borges, Quirell, DarkSaytan, Luiserchote)
description:
Baby Drill

Baby has decided that it is time to find his/her way in life and he/she needs you. Help her/him to dive into the unknown depth with her/his drill toy and reach her/his goal!

How to Play

Turn on your toy-drill with the key and go on!

You have 4 buttons to control it:

🟠 Orange : Shoot your Laser against enemies 👾

🔴 Red : Cold your toy-drill to avoid Overheat 🔥

🟡 Yellow : Recharge your Energy ⚡

🟢 Green : Turbo mode to go faster ⏩

Pay attention to de alerts ℹ️⚠️🛑 and good luck!

(You can quit the game with  Esc)
